title: Requirements Gathering for ImmutableDistributedSystemsProtocol
description: Gather and document detailed functional (operational requirements, user stories) and non-functional requirements (performance, scalability, security) for the ImmutableDistributedSystemsProtocol. Identify potential edge cases and error handling strategies. Ensure that all gathered requirements align with the overall project goals, focusing on clarity, completeness, and feasibility. Collaborate with relevant team members to ensure alignment with the project's vision.

title: Design RFC for ImmutableDistributedSystemsProtocol
description: Write a design proposal (RFC) outlining the architecture and key components of the ImmutableDistributedSystemsProtocol. This RFC will serve as a guide for the development of the protocol, focusing on simplicity and ease of reasoning about distributed state.

title: Decompose Design RFC into Tasks
description: Break down the design RFC into smaller, manageable tasks for implementation.

title: Implement ImmutableDataStructureManager
description: Create an immutable data structure manager that handles storage and retrieval of data in the distributed system.

title: Implement PureFunctionExecutor Service
description: Develop a service that executes pure functions in the distributed system.

title: Database Schema Design for ImmutableDistributedSystemsProtocol
description: Design the database schema to store and manage data within the distributed system, considering scalability, fault tolerance, and performance. Include a strategy for handling data versioning, concurrency control, and efficient querying for large datasets. Provide details on chosen database technology and rationale behind the choice.

title: Integration Testing of ImmutableDistributedSystemsProtocol
description: Perform integration tests to ensure that the distributed system is functioning correctly according to the design and requirements.

title: Deploy ImmutableDistributedSystemsProtocol
description: Deploy the developed distributed system to a production environment.

title: Document ImmutableDistributedSystemsProtocol
description: Write comprehensive documentation for the developed distributed system, including a detailed explanation of the architecture, APIs, use-cases, and best practices for implementation. The goal is to simplify reasoning about distributed state.
